dataIdInfo.idPurp: A toolbox for creating project boundaries from CoreLogicDatabase tax parcels. Intended for "small projects" that can be created or re-created from a small amount of parcels and do not require pre-existing spatial data.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: This tool was developed by Grace Alston during her TCF internship in the summer of 2022.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: A toolbox that takes user selected parcels (usually from CoreLogicDatabase) and dissolves them into project boundaries and tax parcels. The tool prompts the user for the parcels, project's name, number (optional if not TCF acquisition), year, and program. The user may select to append the project boundary and parcels to its respective program-wide project boundary and parcel feature layers hosted on AGOL (recommended).
